name: JavaScript

typing.description: JavaScript uses dynamic, weak typing where types are determined at runtime and implicit conversions often occur.

learning_curve: Moderate - Easy to start, tricky details
description: JavaScript is the primary language of the web, running in browsers and on servers through Node.js. It supports multiple paradigms including functional and object-oriented programming.

syntax_style.case_convention: camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for classes
